mapper.select: SELECT A.CLASSESTREE_CODE AS pdNormsCode ,CONCAT(Bcl.CLASSES_NAME,'/',mac.MACHINING_NAME,'/',Cbr.BREED_NAME,'/',Dfe.FEATURE_NAME,'/',Egr.WEIGHT_NAME) AS pdName ,A.NETWEIGHT_OUT AS netWeightOut ,A.GROSSWEIGHT_OUT AS grossWeightOut ,A.NORMS_LENGTH AS normsLength ,A.NORMS_WIDTH AS normsWidth ,A.NORMS_HEIGHT AS normsHeight ,A.NORMS_VOLUME AS normsVolume FROM PD_NORMS_STD AS A LEFT JOIN PD_STANDARD AS Ast ON Ast.STANDARD_ID = A.STANDARD_ID INNER JOIN PD_CLASSES Bcl ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Bcl.CLASSES_CODE INNER JOIN pd_machining mac ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = mac.CLASSES_CODE AND mac.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE INNER JOIN PD_BREED Cbr ON Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Cbr.CLASSES_CODE AND Cbr.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Cbr.BREED_CODE INNER JOIN PD_FEATURE Dfe ON Ast.FEATURE_CODE = Dfe.FEATURE_CODE AND Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Dfe.CLASSES_CODE AND Dfe.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Dfe.BREED_CODE INNER JOIN pd_weight Egr ON Ast.WEIGHT_CODE =Egr.WEIGHT_CODE AND Ast.FEATURE_CODE = Egr.FEATURE_CODE AND Ast.CLASSES_CODE = Egr.CLASSES_CODE AND Egr.MACHINING_CODE = Ast.MACHINING_CODE AND Ast.BREED_CODE = Egr.BREED_CODE
